medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain was initially diffuse and has localized to the right lower quadrant over the course of three days, described as dull and moderate in severity. The patient also notes subjective fevers and decreased appetite. No aggravating or relieving factors were specified.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past Medical History: Peripheral vascular disease (PVD), tobacco abuse, pancreatitis, remote cervical spine and lower back injury; Past Surgical History: Right external iliac artery stent, left common iliac artery stent, left hand fracture.
medical_history.family_history: There is no family history of premature atherosclerosis or peripheral vascular disease.
